message.content:
1. A glycemic profile evaluation was conducted.
2. The evaluation involved a 4-hour infusion.
3. The infusion used was 500 ml of 0.9% saline.
4. The infusion also used was 500 ml of 5% glucose solution.
5. The evaluation was conducted with and without quinine.
6. The dose of quinine used was 500 mg.
7. The evaluation was conducted on ten healthy volunteers.
8. Out of the ten volunteers, eight were men.
9. The average age of the volunteers was 28 years.
10. The age range of the volunteers had a standard deviation of 9 years.

messages.content:
Statement: We evaluated the glycemic profile in response to 4 h infusion of 500 ml of 0.9% saline versus 5% glucose solution with and without quinine at therapeutic dose (500 mg) in ten healthy volunteers (8 men) aged 28 ± 9 years.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
